tests.name: Full Body Check
tests.description: A complete health checkup that includes 42 tests to assess overall health.

tests.name: Cardiac Risk Assessment
tests.description: Cardiac health check including cholesterol, ECG, and BP tests.

tests.name: Stress Assessment
tests.description: Evaluate cortisol levels and other key stress indicators.

tests.name: Covid RTPCR
tests.description: Evaluates the health of your liver using 12 essential parameters.

tests.name: Liver Function Test
tests.description: Evaluates the health of your liver using 12 essential parameters.

tests.name: Complete Blood Count
tests.description: Provides important information about the kinds and numbers of cells in the blood.

tests.name: Diabetes Test
tests.description: Includes blood glucose fasting, PP, and HbA1c tests.

tests.name: Kidney Function Test
tests.description: Evaluates urea, creatinine, uric acid and more to check kidney health.

tests.name: Thyroid Test
tests.description: Includes T3, T4, and TSH to assess thyroid function.

tests.name: Lipid Profile Test
tests.description: Includes T3, T4, and TSH to assess thyroid function.
